full_description:
Xiaomi PB100DZM 22.5W 10000mAh Fast Charging Power Bank

The Xiaomi PB100DZM Power Bank is a portable device that is designed to charge a variety of electronic devices. It comes with two USB-A ports and one Type-C port, which can be used to output power at the same time, making it possible to charge multiple devices simultaneously. The Power Bank is compatible with devices such as phones, tablet computers, and Xiaomi band. The device is equipped with fast charging protocols such as PD and QC3+, which means that it can charge mainstream devices like phones, tablets, Switch, and band at a much faster rate than conventional chargers. Additionally, the Power Bank has a low-current charging mode that can be accessed by double-clicking the battery check button. This mode is ideal for charging low-current devices like smartwatches and Bluetooth headsets. The Xiaomi PB100DZM Power Bank is powered by a Lithium-ion polymer battery with a rated capacity of 5500mAh (5V/3A). It has an input interface of Type-C and output interfaces of USB-A and Type-C. The input parameters for the device are 5V-3A and 9V-2.5A, while the output parameters for USB-A and Type-C are 5V-3A, 9V-2.23A, 12V-1.67A, and 10V-2.25A MAX. All three ports can output 5V-3A. This Xiaomi PB100DZM Power Bank is a portable and versatile device that can be used to charge a wide range of electronic devices. It is equipped with fast charging protocols, multiple output ports, and a low-current charging mode, making it a reliable and convenient solution for on-the-go charging needs.

Buy Xiaomi PB100DZM 22.5W 10000mAh Fast Charging Power Bank from Star Tech

In Bangladesh, you can get the original Xiaomi PB100DZM 22.5W 10000mAh Power Bank From Star Tech. We have a large collection of the latest Xiaomi Power Bank to purchase for your mobile phone. Xiaomi MI V3 PLM18ZM 20000mAh Power Bank

Xiaomi MI V3 PLM18ZM Power Bank is comes with 20000mAh (3.7V, 74W) big capacity, 2 USB-A/ USB-C totally triple output and 2-way fast charger, charge efficiency. Here used High-quality lithium-ion Li-polymer Battery. This power bank is designed with Micro USB,USB Type C Input Interface, Double USB,Type C Output Interface and 12V/1.5A Output. The Xiaomi power bank also supports Quick Charge Technology (Two-way Quick Charge). It has 6 Month Warranty (Must Claim With Box & All Accessories).
